MBTA Signage in CSS

August 6th, 2024

My train-obsessed friend Billy wanted an MBTA sign template for his website. This is my attempt at creating one: a success in my book and a load of fun to make. He recreated the icons in Inkscape, but we’re hoping to receive better icon files straight from the agency soon.

Copley
Green Line - Gov Ctr & North
Downtown Crossing
Orange Line - All Trains
Red Line - All Trains
Harvard
OUTBOUND TRAINS
INBOUND TRAINS

The multi-layered South Station sign is my magnum opus. The only deviation from accuracy is in the dividers between each icon; the MBTA includes a divider after the last icon, I thought that looked clunky so I did without it.

South Station
Silver Line - SL1/SL2
Red Line - All Trains
Commuter Rail
Amtrak
Aquarium
Blue Line - All Trains

The code is admittedly a bit convoluted, but it works. If you want to use this, you’re free to poke around in Inspect and/or email me for help.
